name: Quorecommender
tagline: Recommending Topics for Questions in Quora
body:
### Quorecommender: Suggesting topics to questions on Quora automatically.
This is the website for the project Quorecommender, which was a result of a term project for a course on Information Retrieval (CS60092) taken at the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, which was taught by Prof. Pawan Goyal and Prof. Animesh Mukherjee. 


### Authors and Contributors
The project has been developed by a team of 6 people from a background in Mathematics and Computer Science. Here are there names:
- Arnav Jain @arnavkj1995
- Abhinav Jain @abhinavjain241
- Divyansh Gupta @guptadivyansh
- Nishant Nikhil @nishnik
- Adarsh Pandey @pandeyadarsh
- Shubham Agrawal @shubham0473

### Support or Contact
Check out the README.md on the repository for further information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
